name: 以罪之名 / In the name of sin
description: This is a judgment which In the name of sin: you will carry the crime of indirect murder, and involved in killing game which full of spite and fraud. Five rounds game of chance which in relation to life and death, 12 sinners, they will fight for the redemption! Everyone of us is guilty, who will be forgiven? And who will be saved?
